mapper.select: /* getEncrptedKey */ SELECT comm_cd_val_nm encryptedKey FROM licom_comm_cd_dtl WHERE comm_cd_id = 'CRYPT_KEY' AND eff_end_dt = '99991231'
/* getCurrentMailCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM app_enterprise WHERE mail = #{currentMail}
/* getCurrentIdCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM app_enterprise_user WHERE id = #{currentId}
mapper.insert:
/* insertAppEnterprise */ INSERT INTO app_enterprise (enterprise_key, name, registration_number, corporate_body_name, mobile_phone_number, address, website, mail, phone_number, type, reg_time) VALUES (null, #{name}, #{registrationNumber}, #{corporateBodyName}, #{mobilePhoneNumber}, #{address}, #{website}, #{mail}, #{phoneNumber}, #{type}, #{time})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

/* insertAppEnterpriseUser */ INSERT INTO app_enterprise_user (enterprise_user_key, enterprise_key, id, password, name, auth, agree_id, reg_time) VALUES (#{enterpriseUserKey}, #{enterpriseKey}, #{id}, #{password}, #{corporateBodyName}, 'AU00', #{agreeId}, #{time})

/* insertAgreementInfo */ INSERT INTO app_enterprise_user_agree_info_hst (AGREE_ID, ENTERPRISE_USER_KEY, MANAGE_YN, PERSONAL_INFO_YN, AUDIT_DTM) VALUES (#{agreeId}, #{enterpriseUserKey}, #{manageYn}, #{personalInfoYn}, NOW())
mapper.select: /* queryAppEnterpriseUserByToken */ SELECT enterprise_user_key, enterprise_key, auth, id, password, name FROM app_enterprise_user WHERE token = #{token}
mapper.insert: /* insertNormalAppEnterpriseUser */ INSERT INTO app_enterprise_user (enterprise_user_key, enterprise_key, id, password, name, auth, reg_time) VALUES (#{enterpriseUserKey}, #{enterpriseKey}, #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, 'AU02', #{time})
mapper.select: /* queryAppEnterpriseUserById */ SELECT a.id , a.name , a.auth , a.password , a.enterprise_user_key enterpriseUserKey , b.type , CASE WHEN a.agree_id > 0 THEN IFNULL((SELECT 'N' FROM app_terms d WHERE d.APP_CL_CD = '02' AND d.TRM_CL_CD = '02' AND d.country_cd = 'KR' AND DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_time, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') BETWEEN d.eff_sta_dtm AND d.eff_end_dtm AND d.eff_end_dtm = '99991231235959' ), 'Y') ELSE 'Y' END AS manageChgYn , CASE WHEN a.agree_id > 0 THEN IFNULL((SELECT 'N' FROM app_terms d WHERE d.APP_CL_CD = '02' AND d.TRM_CL_CD = '01' AND d.country_cd = 'KR' AND DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_time, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') BETWEEN d.eff_sta_dtm AND d.eff_end_dtm AND d.eff_end_dtm = '99991231235959' ), 'Y') ELSE 'Y' END AS personalInfoChgYn , CASE WHEN a.agree_id > 0 THEN (SELECT c.manage_yn FROM app_enterprise_user_agree_info_hst c WHERE c.agree_id = a.agree_id ) ELSE 'N' END AS manageYn , CASE WHEN a.agree_id > 0 THEN (SELECT c.personal_info_yn FROM app_enterprise_user_agree_info_hst c WHERE c.agree_id = a.agree_id ) ELSE 'N' END AS perosnalInfoYn FROM app_enterprise_user a , app_enterprise b WHERE a.enterprise_key = b.enterprise_key AND a.id = #{id}

/* getDeliveryInfo */ SELECT dv_id deliveryId, sequence FROM app_physical_distribution WHERE (SELECT type FROM app_physical_distribution WHERE enterprise_user_key = #{enterpriseUserKey} ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) = 'DV' AND dv_id = (SELECT MAX(dv_id) FROM app_physical_distribution WHERE enterprise_user_key = #{enterpriseUserKey}) ORDER BY physical_distribution_key LIMIT 1
mapper.update: /* updateToken */ UPDATE app_enterprise_user SET token = #{token} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: /* queryUserList */ SELECT enterprise_user_key AS enterpriseUserKey, id, name, auth FROM app_enterprise_user WHERE enterprise_key = #{enterpriseKey} AND auth IN ('AU02', 'AU03') ORDER BY auth ASC, name ASC
/* queryAppEnterpriseUserByEnterpriseUserKey */ SELECT * FROM app_enterprise_user WHERE enterprise_user_key = #{enterpriseUserKey} AND (auth = 'AU02' OR auth = 'AU03')
mapper.update: /* updateUserInfo */ UPDATE app_enterprise_user SET password = #{password}, name = #{name} WHERE enterprise_user_key = #{enterpriseUserKey}
/* updateMyInfo */ UPDATE app_enterprise_user SET password = #{password}, name = #{name} WHERE token = #{token}
/* updateUserAuth */ UPDATE app_enterprise_user SET auth = 'AU02' WHERE enterprise_user_key = #{enterpriseUserKey}
/* updateUserAuthDeactivate */ UPDATE app_enterprise_user SET auth = 'AU03' WHERE enterprise_user_key = #{enterpriseUserKey}
mapper.select: /* queryAppEnterpriseCount */ SELECT count(*) FROM app_enterprise WHERE mail = #{mail}
/* queryCertificationCode */ SELECT mail_certification_code.certification_code FROM mail_certification_code WHERE mail = #{mail}
/* queryOrderBySequence */ SELECT ORDER_SEQ orderNumber FROM app_seq WHERE SEQUENCE = #{sequence}
/* queryAppPhysicalDistributionType */ SELECT seq_st_cd type FROM app_seq WHERE sequence = #{sequence}
mapper.insert:
/* insertAppPhysicalDistribution */ INSERT INTO app_physical_distribution (physical_distribution_key, SEQUENCE, latitude, longitude, type, time, enterprise_user_key, dv_id, province, city, district, full_address, biz_nm, svc_nm, location_cd) VALUES
(null, #{sequence}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{type}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{enterpriseUserKey}, #{deliveryId}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{fullAddress}, #{bizNm}, #{svcNm}, #{locationCd})

/* insertSingleAppPhysicalDistribution */ INSERT INTO app_physical_distribution (physical_distribution_key, SEQUENCE, latitude, longitude, type, time, enterprise_user_key, dv_id, province, city, district, full_address, biz_nm, svc_nm, location_cd) VALUES (null, #{singleSequence}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{type}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{enterpriseUserKey}, #{deliveryId}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{fullAddress}, #{bizNm}, #{svcNm}, #{locationCd})
mapper.select: /* getPackageStatus */ SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT eff_end_dtm FROM app_seq_rel_hst WHERE c_seq = #{sequence} ORDER BY eff_end_dtm DESC LIMIT 1) = '99991231235959' THEN 'PG' ELSE 'UP' END AS 'Package Status'
mapper.update: /* deleteSequenceRelationByParent */ UPDATE app_seq_rel_hst SET eff_end_dtm = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), term_rsn_cd = #{type} WHERE p_seq = #{sequence} AND eff_end_dtm = '99991231235959'
/* updateSequenceDates */ UPDATE app_seq SET PROD_MAKE_DT = #{prodMakeDate}, PROD_OUT_DT = #{prodReleaseDtm}, PROD_EXP_DT = #{codeExpireDt} WHERE sequence = #{sequence}
mapper.select: /* queryPhysicalDistributionList */ SELECT apd.latitude, apd.longitude, ae.name AS enterpriseName, apd.time, aeu.name AS enterpriseUserName, apd.type AS productDistributionType, province, city, district, full_address AS fullAddress FROM app_physical_distribution apd LEFT JOIN app_enterprise_user aeu ON aeu.enterprise_user_key = apd.enterprise_user_key LEFT JOIN app_enterprise ae ON aeu.enterprise_key = ae.enterprise_key WHERE apd.SEQUENCE = #{sequence} ORDER BY apd.time DESC
/* selectRelationBySequence */ SELECT c_seq childSequence, p_seq parentSequence FROM app_seq_rel_hst WHERE c_seq = #{childSequence} AND eff_end_dtm = '99991231235959' LIMIT 1
mapper.insert:
/* insertParentChildrenRelation */ INSERT INTO app_seq_rel_hst (c_seq, p_seq, eff_sta_dtm, eff_end_dtm, enterprise_user_key) VALUES
(#{childSequence}, #{sequence}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '99991231235959', #{enterpriseUserKey})
mapper.select: /* getParentSequence */ SELECT p_seq FROM app_seq_rel_hst WHERE c_seq = #{sequence} AND eff_end_dtm = '99991231235959'
mapper.delete: /* deleteParentChildrenRelation */ UPDATE app_seq_rel_hst SET EFF_END_DTM = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), TERM_RSN_CD = 'UP' WHERE eff_end_dtm = '99991231235959' AND (c_seq = #{sequence} OR p_seq = #{sequence})
mapper.select: /* queryInventoryList */ SELECT loi.PROD_NM svcNm, SUM( CASE WHEN apd.TYPE = 'WH' THEN 1 WHEN apd.TYPE = 'RL' THEN -1 WHEN apd.TYPE = 'SL' THEN -1 WHEN apd.TYPE = 'TB' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS totalCount FROM app_enterprise_user aeu INNER JOIN app_physical_distribution apd ON aeu.enterprise_user_key = apd.enterprise_user_key INNER JOIN app_seq asq ON asq.SEQUENCE = apd.SEQUENCE INNER JOIN lian_order_info loi ON loi.ORDER_SEQ = asq.ORDER_SEQ WHERE aeu.enterprise_key = (SELECT enterprise_key FROM app_enterprise_user WHERE id = #{userId}) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM app_seq_rel_hst rel WHERE apd.SEQUENCE = rel.p_seq) GROUP BY loi.PROD_NM
/* getRelationSequences */ SELECT sequence, p_sequence parentSequence FROM app_seq_rel

/* selectDemoData */ SELECT a.p_sequence parentSequence , a.sequence sequence , c.PROD_NM svcNm , b.SEQ_ST_CD sequenceStatusCd , (SELECT d.comm_cd_val_nm FROM licom_comm_cd_dtl d WHERE d.comm_cd_id = 'SEQ_ST_CD' AND d.comm_cd_val = b.SEQ_ST_CD AND d.country_cd = 'KR' ) as sequenceStatusNm FROM app_seq_rel a , app_seq b , lian_order_info c WHERE a.sequence = b.SEQUENCE AND b.ORDER_SEQ = c.ORDER_SEQ ORDER BY 1
mapper.update: /* updateUserAgreementInfo */ UPDATE app_enterprise_user SET agree_id = #{agreeId}, reg_time = NOW() WHERE enterprise_user_key = #{enterpriseUserKey}
mapper.select: /* getUserCountByIdToken */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM app_enterprise_user WHERE enterprise_user_key = #{enterpriseUserKey} and token = #{token}
